featured.text: Although Mr. Chen is rich, he is a very _____ person and is never willing to spend any money to help those who are in need.
Since it is cheap to produce and rich in protein, and has many uses, the soybean could provide food to the world’s growing population.
In 1952, his first book, The Decisive Moment, a rich collection of his work spanning two decades, was published.
Dried fish heads and spines are exported to West Africa, where they are used as the base of a protein-rich soup.

other.text: Carnegie became a very rich businessman and set aside money to honor heroes like William.
Soon, she realizes that her poor family is rich in things that matter in life.

As she points out they are not sitting at a table where rich people would sit, her parents calculate the value of the desert hills, the blooming cactus, the calls of eagles, and one another’s company.

Zoe was rather healthy when she was found, and once under the care of the orphanage she was very happy, consuming six gallons of vitamin-rich milk a day and earning a reputation as a confident, naughty and mischievous youngster.
His family was rich but was very economical.
People drink tea to become rich and healthy.
She concludes that this is indeed a table where rich people sit.
The Table Where Rich People Sit.
The government project was started due to its rich natural resources.
According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Tofu is a rich protein source.

definition.zh_def: 富有的，擁有大量財富或資源的。
definition.en_def: Having a great deal of money or assets; wealthy.
definition.example: She became rich after starting her own successful business.
